channel.title: [LFT] JS,PHP,HTML Web Developer(s) Request
channel.description:
I'm working on a website project that is aimed towards Twitch self promotion and the ability to find new and current broadcasters looking for more viewers/followers. I couldn't really find a solid site the advertise upon without seeing multiple sites having an option to advertise but based on a single game only.
I have a blueprint of the site, operations, and plans.
Additional information and a web demo will be shown via skype. Apply below if interested.
[CODE] Age: Fluent Languages (JS,PHP,HTML, *others?*): Experience in web development (valued in years): Skype: Participating time (dedication to the site/contacting us): Misc Information: [/CODE]

item.title: [LFT] JS,PHP,HTML Web Developer(s) Request
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

jal knight:

Ruby is pretty big for being 8-9

Grow up kiddies. Arguing over completely nothing. Age doesn’t matter, regardless what it comes to (unless it’s smoking, drinking, buying rated M games, or being a senior citizen.) How you act matters, no one is going to want someone to do work for them if they start arguments on a thread, in a RSPS community filled with mostly geeks and people that don’t have much else to do with their lives. Just move on with life. You’re not even going to be at this community in ten years (hopefully) so why start pointless arguments. When you each reach the day where you’ve finally matured and ready to start in the world, you’ll look back at some of these posts and realize that you were f*cking retarded.

Anywaysss… On topic…

OP, could you include some about what you want the developer to do? What are your expectations?

Read full topic

item.title: [LFT] JS,PHP,HTML Web Developer(s) Request
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:12, topic:546331”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=665231.msg4454684#msg4454684 date=1413929729]

First of all, i’m probably older then you, since you are only 8…
Second of all, i never called myself a decent java OR web developer, i keep developing,
And last of all, you can think whatever you want, but that doesnt change the fact that you are a huge prick.

No, I’m not only 8 my friend.
You did. You’ve edited your post from “good website developer” to “learning website developer”.
I’ve never once said I wasn’t a prick, I pride myself on being such a forward person, for your information.
[/quote]

Forward and being a total runt is really a different thing, and i really am not your friend at the moment.
And you must be 8-9, you’re the most immature kid i have seen in a long time.[/quote]
Ruby is pretty big for being 8-9

Read full topic

item.title: [LFT] JS,PHP,HTML Web Developer(s) Request
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:7, topic:546331”]I ment to say i’m pretty good at java, i’m so sorry for the tiny ass mistake i made, and you have no idea how much hours i spend and failed, and kept on going, untill it worked, you have no clue how hard i worked on Aggroth, day after day and night after night, so you had no fudgeing right to call me “aids”…

I am still learning as hard as i can, and you should just fk off with your opinions you giant prick.

And you have no idea how bad those diseases are, so shut up about them.[/quote]
There’s maybe 3 average java programmers active on MoparScape, you’re not one of them. AtomicInt_, Sinisoul and Davidi2 are the only ones that spring to mind. You do not.

I have a right to my opinion and my opinion is your work is shit while you call it good, it’s not good.

I’ll say what I want, thanks, don’t need a 13 year old telling me what I can and can’t talk about.

Read full topic

I didn’t get demoted I left you tool (the ex-staff badge is only awarded to those who step down, not those removed)

You aren’t what’s classed as a good designer so don’t say you are. I’m not being a cunt I’m speaking the truth.

item.title: [LFT] JS,PHP,HTML Web Developer(s) Request
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Age:
17

Fluent Languages (JS,PHP,HTML, others?):
Java, CSS, Html

Experience in web development (valued in years):
4 years java, 2 years HTML/Css

Skype:
Waddafoock

Participating time (dedication to the site/contacting us):
Shit loads of free time, 8 hours a day~

Misc Information:
Im a learning website designer, however not that good at scripting, still learning.
I mean i’m not horrible, i can do basic stuff, but not like pro scripts.
